title: Gnome
content:
Gnome Racial Features Gnome Cunning Base Racial Speed Subraces Deep Gnome Forest Gnome Rock Gnome

Gnome Cunning Base Racial Speed

Deep Gnome Forest Gnome Rock Gnome

Gnome is a Race in Baldur's Gate 3. Gnomes have an increased speed as part of their racial feature. While creating your Character in Baldur's Gate 3, you can choose between 11 different types of Races. Each of them has their own special characteristics.

BG3 Full Game Note: In the full launch of Baldur's Gate 3, Ability Score Poin
